name: Hotshot Pool
description:
To celebrate the huge success of the no. 1 global smash, we've added 20 more levels! It's "the Angry Birds of pool games" and it's on Game Center too with over 30 achievements.

Like pool or snooker? You’ll love this. Like puzzle/arcade games? You’ll love this. Like trick shots games? You’ll love this. Like hot girls? You’ll love this.

Can you complete all 120 levels of puzzle/arcade pool action? With five stages and five girls to unlock, it starts easy, but gets harder and harder!

Can you get three gold stars on each level and complete the 30+ achievements? Good luck and enjoy!
